metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1782 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The kex_agree_methods function in libssh2 before 1.5.0 allows remoteservers to cause a denial of service (crash) or have other unspecifiedimpact via crafted length values in an SSH_MSG_KEXINIT packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh2-1 - 1.4.3-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.3-2ubuntu0.2').
